comment: He was a great professor. If you put in the work , it will be easy to pass this class. You have to do research with your group mates and present it. Fairly easy! He is very nice and caring... He has very helpful study guides and his tests are straightforward. Research aspect of the class looks great on a resume!

Dr. Carpenter is really a great professor and he makes this class easy and enjoyable for the students taking it. Tests are super straightforward. The lab is a great resume builder, however it can get a bit tedious. I highly recommend this professor even with his quirks.

Highly straightforward. Grades spread across multiple categories so performing poorly on one or two assignments/tests won't hurt you severely. Tests rely on PowerPoints, his study guides are super helpful. He likes to talk about the textbook; I have not opened it once and I've been fine. He is very strict on deadlines, though. 25% off per day late.
